archimate:ImplementationEvent.name: 21.11.2023 - Met with Lukáš Sturm and Tomáš Franek
archimate:ImplementationEvent.documentation:
Sami Aura and Mattias Dahlberg met with Lukáš Sturm and Tomáš Franek on the topic of Service Configuration Management.
What happened • 6 out of the 29 examples in CMDB weren't populated properly ○ Reason: there were ongoing changes for the CI's. Asset location was incorrect. § The process is clear, but the CI owner wasn't following the process.
The conclusions from the meeting were: • Proposed Corrective Action: Decide which attributes should be required or not and whether some fields will have default values • Auditors were provided with the CMDB blueprint and presented with the homepage of the IT Asset and Configuration Management, which includes a large set of educational videos
Lukas said that based on the findings, they are revisiting the CI classifications and which classification should have certain fields as mandatory and which not. Their team has started to also produce a lot of educational videos to raise awareness of the process.
